item.title: Quantum Break review
item.description:
Quantum Break review

If nothing else, Quantum Break demonstrates that Finnish developer Remedy Entertainment's priorities remain constant. Remedy has always displayed a flair for putting its own distinct, and often...

item.title: This Week on Xbox: April 1, 2016
item.description:
This Week on Xbox: April 1, 2016

This week features a new Quantum Break live action trailer, Killer Instinct Season 3, Final Fantasy XV, new backward compatibility titles, Star Wars and more!

item.title: Starting today, anyone can turn their Xbox One into a dev kit for free
item.description:
Starting today, anyone can turn their Xbox One into a dev kit for free

Microsoft today made good on a nearly three-year-old promise, unlocking the ability for all retail Xbox One consoles to become development kits free of charge. Xbox Dev Mode is available starting today as a preview and will be finalized as a full release this summer.

item.title: Minecraft: The video game that builds kids' brain cells
item.description:
Minecraft: The video game that builds kids' brain cells

Microsoft's popular video game Minecraft helps kids learn everything from programming, science and math to art, languages and history.

item.title: Xbox One 500GB Special Edition Quantum Break Bundle Giveaway
item.description:
Xbox One 500GB Special Edition Quantum Break Bundle Giveaway

Quantum Break is set to release on 05 April and what better way to celebrate the launch of one of the year's most anticipated titles than by giving away an Xbox One 500GB Special Edition Quantum Break Bundle and other cool prizes.

item.title: Free Multiplayer Weekend on Xbox 360 - April 1-3
item.description:
Free Multiplayer Weekend on Xbox 360 - April 1-3

Try multiplayer free on Xbox 360 from 4/1 through 4/3. It's the perfect time to experience the best of your games and play online with friends. Games sold separately.

item.title: Homefront: The Revolution 'Ignite' Trailer (Official)
item.description:
Homefront: The Revolution 'Ignite' Trailer (Official)

Playing as freedom fighter Ethan Brady, the ultimate goal in Homefront is to inspire the people to rise up against the brutal military occupation and ignite the revolution. 'Hearts and Minds' represents the state of uprising across the oppressed Yellow Zones of occupied Philadelphia, and will increase as the player performs acts of resistance, such as destroying KPA infrastructure.

item.title: Eli Roth's "The Witches" Dark Souls Animated Trailer
item.description:
Eli Roth's "The Witches" Dark Souls Animated Trailer

Eli Roth brought his iconic vision to the Dark Souls franchise with his animated short 'The Witches'. Watch as he blends his one of a kind style with the world of Dark Souls. Learn more: http://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/dark-souls-3

item.title: Ghosts of Meridian Release Coming Next Week to Halo 5: Guardians
item.description:
Ghosts of Meridian Release Coming Next Week to Halo 5: Guardians

Ghosts of Meridian - the latest, free content release for Halo 5: Guardians - arrives next week. The release includes two new maps, new weapons and vehicles, new visual customizations, and more. 343 Industries will be showcasing all the new Ghosts of Meridian content during a livestream on Tuesday, April 5 from 3 p.m.

item.title: R.B.I. Baseball 16 now available for Xbox One
item.description:
R.B.I. Baseball 16 now available for Xbox One

Make the play with your favorite Major League Baseball team and win the World Series! R.B.I. 16 features enhanced lighting and graphics, revamped defensive AI, an improved batting system, and the ability to sim through games in Season mode. Feel the action with new fielding moves like dives, wall catches, pump-fakes and more!
